1.title: The Letter
1.plot: Zoe receives a mysterious letter inviting her to the The Modern Advancements Department. In this episode we explore how to build a website with Rob Rush from Wix.com. JD takes a trip over to Wix.com to learn more about HTML from Charlie Kane. Learn how to make a flow chart in the DIY experiment.

2.title: Red Alert
2.plot: Episode 2 "Red Alert" There's trouble in the Modern Advancements Department when Zoe triggers the "Red Alert" Protocol. Will the Professor's guests from Republic Solar be able to shed some light on the problem?

3.title: Lost Password
3.plot: The Professor can't remember his password to the mainframe. Zoe tries to help while J.D. visits Xilinx for a logical solution.

4.title: It's Your Lab Now
4.plot: Episode 4 "It's Your Lab Now" - Professor Bell refuses to reveal anything about his top secret project, but Zoe needs to work on a science project of her own. M. A. D. Lab's Wi-Fi goes down and weird things start happening, while JD tries out a telepresence system at Cisco Systems. Will Zoe ever be able to get to the bottom of it?

5.title: Sick Day
5.plot: Episode 5 "Sick Day" It is Zoe's first day as an official M. A. D. Scientist, but Professor Bell has come down with a peculiar illness. JD goes to Microsoft to learn about the technology behind the XBOX, while the Professor searched for a cure.

6.title: New Pet
6.plot: When Zoe and her friends find a stray puppy, they take it to the M. A. D. Lab where it gets into some experimental growth formula. With help from a geneticist from UCSF, can The M. A. D. team reverse the process before it's too late?

7.title: Parents
7.plot: Episode 7 "Parents" - JD is getting his learner's permit, but when his car breaks down, Zoe and Professor do their best to fix it while JD heads to the Tech Museum. Zoe's mom unexpectedly shows up wondering where she has been going all this time.

8.title: The Door
8.plot: It's Professor Bell's day off, and Zoe gets another mysterious message, this time in code. JD learns about state of the art media with a representative from Dolby. Will Zoe finally crack the code to the Professor's Private lab? Ajit Ninan, Director of Engineering at Dolby Labs visits the Modern Advancements Departments to break down codes, codecs and reveal the connections movies have to math.

9.title: Disaster
9.plot: As a consequence for trying to sneak into the Private lab, Zoe is stuck doing busy work. JD is injured while playing Soccer at the soccer field with his friend, Aaron. JD heads to Los Gatos Foot and Ankle Center to get a check up and tips on how to prevent injury from Dr. Joan Oloff. The Professor show's Zoe how to make a proper first aid kit.

10.title: Bored
10.plot: Episode 10 "Bored" - It's a slow day at the M.A.D. Lab when more mysterious messages appear. This time, Zoe sends JD on a scavenger hunt to find more clues. Where do they lead? Meanwhile, a representative from Xilinx comes to the M.A.D. Lab to explain how the camera systems work.

11.title: Earthquake!
11.plot: JD and Zoe still need answers about the mysterious things that have been happening. JD goes to the California Academy of Science to learn more about seismology and earthquakes. Professor John Caskey from San Francisco State University's Geology Department visits the lab to talk about plate tectonics and fault lines in the Bay Area.

12.title: The Secret
12.plot: Still reeling from the earthquake that damaged the lab, the Professor finally allows Zoe into his private lab to help save his most important experiment. Is it already too late?

imdb.title: M.A.D. Science
plot: Episode 2 "Red Alert" There's trouble in the Modern Advancements Department when Zoe triggers the "Red Alert" Protocol. Will the Professor's guests from Republic Solar be able to shed some light on the problem?::Jen Vaughn
